name: Robo Disposal
description:
Play as a bomb disposal robot. Navigating through the tough environment to make sure bombs are disposed of. 

A key / D key - Left / Right Arrow move the Robot.

Control the robots arms with the mouse.

Left click to extend robots arms, and release to retract arms back.  

Your extendable arms will help you to manoeuvre and find the bomb and dispose of it.

Tip! - Aim the extension arm straight down so its flat on the ground, then when in the air, use  A/D  or the arrows to tip the robot forwards or backwards.
